skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end development, often referred to as client-side development, is a crucial discipline in the realm of web development. It primarily focuses on creating and enhancing the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) of a website or web application

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Backend development is the technological backbone that powers the digital world as we know it today. It's the invisible force behind web and mobile applications, handling the logic, data processing, and server-side operations that enable the user interface to function seamlessly

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI (User Interface) and UX (User Experience) development are integral aspects of creating user-friendly and engaging digital products, such as websites and mobile apps.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: MERN Stack Development is a popular and versatile web development approach. MERN Stack has gained popularity for building modern web applications, including e-commerce platforms, social networks, and content management systems.
